query: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.displayName, c.name as categoryName FROM ingredientUnits u JOIN unitCategories c ON u.categoryId = c.id ORDER BY c.name, u.name LIMIT 30;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 49cxSE1jUeHq7LY.root --database KMmUaMc2BgFeVkUfVYZGPD --execute SELECT u.id, u.name, u.displayName, c.name as categoryName FROM ingredientUnits u JOIN unitCategories c ON u.categoryId = c.id ORDER BY c.name, u.name LIMIT 30;
